Data Transfer Object for returning tool authentication credentials in API responses.

## Key Components

- **ToolCredentialsResponse** - Main DTO class with Swagger documentation for API responses
- **username** - String field for basic authentication username
- **password** - String field for basic authentication password  
- **apiKey** - Nested ToolApiKeyResponse object for API key-based authentication
- **Lombok annotations** - `@Data`, `@Builder`, `@NoArgsConstructor`, `@AllArgsConstructor` for boilerplate code generation
- **Swagger annotations** - `@Schema` for OpenAPI documentation with descriptions and examples

## Usage Example

```java
// Creating a credentials response with builder pattern
ToolCredentialsResponse credentials = ToolCredentialsResponse.builder()
    .username("admin")
    .password("password123")
    .apiKey(ToolApiKeyResponse.builder()
        .keyName("X-API-Key")
        .keyValue("abc123xyz")
        .build())
    .build();

// Using in REST controller
@GetMapping("/tools/{id}/credentials")
public ResponseEntity<ToolCredentialsResponse> getToolCredentials(@PathVariable String id) {
    ToolCredentialsResponse credentials = toolService.getCredentials(id);
    return ResponseEntity.ok(credentials);
}
```

This DTO supports both basic authentication (username/password) and API key authentication patterns, providing flexibility for different external tool integration requirements.
